content:
Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 19}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a turtle_helmet I need to place 5 scutes in the shape of a helmet in the crafting table. I have enough scutes in slot 15 and so I will start by moving one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 19}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}]
thought: The next scute needs to go to the right of the first scute, which is slot 2. Therefore I will move a scute from slot 15 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 19}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}]
thought: The next scute needs to go to the right of the second scute, which is slot 3. Therefore I will move a scute from slot 15 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 19}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}]
thought: The next scute needs to go below the first scute, which is slot 4. Therefore I will move a scute from slot 15 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 19}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}]
thought: The next scute needs to go to the right of the fourth scute, which is slot 6. Therefore I will move a scute from slot 15 to slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 6 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 19, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 55, "index": 19}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_roots", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the turtle_helmet, I need to move it to a free inventory slot. I will move it to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
